text: @LBCNews Yes & as a result thousands of all colours of skin will die of #COVID19 because protester do not observe the 2 metre social distancing rule. Do as @Conservatives advised yesterday & stay away. There are safer ways to demand justice, so please save lives & save our NHS. Thanks.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
